column5: Here is an update from CKDR on the location and size of all the forest fires in the Red Lake and Kenora areas.https://www.ckdr.net/2021/07/16/impl...ora-districts/

Our outfitter has formally cancelled all 2021 trips due to the fires around Red Lake area. At least one of their outpost camps has been lost and the main camp on Roderick, which had burned down two years ago and was fully rebuilt is in harms way. What next for these unfortunate camp owners. ((( Really been a terrible run for them
